title: A Walk in the Park
overview: Malik tha Martian is a climber and outdoorsman from the tough side of Memphis who is unafraid to call it as he sees it. Each episode features Malik and a guest taking a walk in a park, which means each episode features Malik and a guest on treadmills outdoors, discussing the topics of the day as the speeds and inclines of the treadmills constantly change.
